description:

So I am nudging him to do an Edge video where he can experiment with the extra "stuff" that seems to be currently out of his limit zone.
Pretty sure he will do it, but don't have anything filmed with him yet. But I think it will happen.
For now, enjoy his solo and an amazingly thick cum shot!
title: Kent - Solo
